nodes.bodyText: @roji is this the correct connection string for Platform? I've kept updates the same (one below)
Yeah that's the good one for multiplexing (though have we turned that on for all database scenarios, or just fortunes?)
Would be turned on for fortunes, single query and multi-query (but not updates). Should they use different ones?

Sorry for not answering this, have been underwater. I plan a thorough pass comparing 5.0 multiplexing, 5.0 non-multiplexing and 4.1.3 perf (i.e. currentl released version of Npgsql) for platform and non-platform benchmarks... I should be able to look into this in a couple of weeks.
